Kusalattika, Hetugocchaka
Kusalattika, Hetusampayuttaduka
Hetusampayuttapada
Paṭiccādivāra
Paccayacatukka
Hetu
10.
966Kusalaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca kusalo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
967Akusalaṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca akusalo hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1)
968Abyākataṃ hetusampayuttaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca abyākato hetusampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (1) (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
11.
969Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe tīṇi…pe…  vipāke ekaṃ…pe…  avigate tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
970Naadhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  navippayutte tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
971(Sahajātavārampi…pe…  sampayuttavārampi paṭiccavārasadisaṃ.)
